titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on slide fasteners, with chain scoops of base metal die-cast onto strips of textal material.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/14/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on slide fasteners, with chain scoops of base metal die-cast onto strips of textile material.
